segments.text: I notice the boy is about to fall, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and he’s still reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while he’s about to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, which is probably for the best right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar, he doesn’t even see how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t hurt himself when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just making everything more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch—this is making me too nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is just chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
